Text:
Thanks YIFY!!!

(Please try and get movie "Brooklyn Castle")
Very good movie, Gordon-Levitt looks more than an ever like a future Heath Ledger with his acting and his looks.
Video quality is very good. The movie itself is pure crap.

Thanks YIFY
A9
V10

Included subtitles are not synced with the framerate of the video.
These subtitles are synced:
http://subscene.com/subtitles/brick/english/63761

Just retitle them withe same filename as the video except with .srt extension, and they will load automatically when you doubleclick the video file.

Thanks for the subs, Sinistral.

This is actually a really unique movie. Really enjoyed this.

Overall / 9.5
